extendedInfo.description: IKAAI LAND with new levels to take you further in your quest to Know All About India !***IKAAI LAND*** is a fun, geography game that helps kids learn about Indian geography in an entertaining way. Remember the time when we were kids and geography lessons in school and at home were limited to just drab atlases and paper maps that we were supposed to mark and color. Thanks to the digital revolution today and the arrival of touch based devices and other apps and educational games, kids today have a lot more to choose from and the best part- learning is now actually fun! Curious already? IKAAI LAND is an educational app by mapsofindia.com in the form of an alien game that makes the learning experience fun and entertaining by taking geography lessons out of the classroom. This map game which also functions as a teaching app, aims at creating awareness among students and educators about Indian geography, ensuring learning breaks out of its conventional form of classrooms, paper and pen. This interesting knowledge app, with its easy, touch based user interface will definitely have kids hooked to learning about India in an engaging manner. What is IKAAI LAND? IKAAI LAND is a place on another planet inhabited by WKAAIs (Want to Know All about India), who are very much in love with India and its Geography. So IKAAI, the alien who is the leader of IKAAI LAND is on mission to India in search of some more WKAAIs with similar interest to expand his kingdom.

reviews.title: ok
reviews.comment: Inside chief minister its hanging when I select the answer. Not yet repaired.
reviews.author: A Google User
